options.name: AE frame interval
options.summary: Gcam AE runs every n frames, where n is the value set here.

options.name: Base exposure compensation
options.summary: The base exposure compensation applied on every frame.

options.name: AE override mode
options.summary: How Gcam AE overrides the AE control.

options.name: Log frame metadata
options.summary: Turn on the start logging per-frame metadata. The metadata are written to /run/camera/gcam_ae_frame_metadata.json when turned off.

options.name: TET converge threshold (in log2 space)
options.summary: The inter-frame TET delta threshold in log2 space below which the TET is considered converged.

options.name: TET converge stabilize duration (ms)
options.summary: The duration in ms for which the inter-frame TET delta has to keep below the TET converge threshold for AE state to transition to converged

options.name: TET rescan threshold (in log2 space)
options.summary: The inter-frame TET delta threshold in log2 space above which will the AE trigger TET searching. Smaller value makes AE more responsive but also more sensitive to TET changes.

options.name: Small converging step (in log2 space)
options.summary: The small TET step used when Gcam AE converges exposure.

options.name: Large converging step (in log2 space)
options.summary: The large TET step used when Gcam AE converges exposure.

options.name: Log scene brightness diff threshold for converging step
options.summary: The threshold of the log scene brightness difference between the target and the current exposure setup. Used for selecting the small or large converging step.

options.name: Default TET retention duration (ms)
options.summary: Default TET retention duration in ms

options.name: Face TET retention duration (ms)
options.summary: TET retention duration in ms when there's a detected face

options.name: Initial TET
options.summary: The initial start-up TET to use during initialization.

options.name: Gain multiplier
options.summary: The multiplier applied on top of the gain calculated from the sensitivity metadata
